Plot a raster

Source: R/mf_raster.R
mf_raster.Rd

Plot a raster object (SpatRaster from terra).

mf_raster(x, add = FALSE, ...)

Arguments

x

a SpatRaster
add

whether to add the layer to an existing plot (TRUE) or not (FALSE).
...

bgalpha, interpolate, or other arguments passed to be passed to plotRGB or plot

Value

No return value, a map is displayed.

Examples

if (require("terra")) {
  r <- rast(system.file("ex/elev.tif", package = "terra"))
  mf_raster(r)
}
#> Loading required package: terra
#> terra version 1.4.22
